content: Hi, http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu2 this test server is down. can someone pls get it up?

While the official server is down feel free to use the public testserver of the heilbronn university:
https://fhir.gecko.hs-heilbronn.de/
FYI this server will probably be down another day or so... Someone in our data centre decided to take it off the internet this weekend. I expect an annoying day is about to happen for me. :)

yayyyy.... server being up is a great news..
thanks for the heads up for upcoming outages :)
